comment_text: WOW, even your worst video is good ! If you wana make a video on musical saw physics, just ask me !
From one Christian to another, this is one of the best video's ever on youtube. It shows a great family having fun, one thing most videos lack. Thanks for the video!
Haha...I struggled with naming it "Reepicheep's coracle", but decided the Dawn Treader was too awesome to pass up!
I mounted a video camera on the back of my boat.... then hit record.
Great video. Both an interesting idea, and a good way to implement it. I like the name of your kayak... Caspian would be proud.

I see.  I was curious if you used a digicam and took images ever X # of seconds, then create a video from the still shots.  Thats how I make my time lapse videos.  The problem with doing it this way though is I have to have the camera hooked to my laptop, since I  software controlling the camera.

I used a Sony Handicam mounted to the back of my kayak.  I let it record onto tape and then sped up the video.  I mounted it with a home made custom mount consisting of threaded rods welded to square tubing.
what kind of camera did you use to do this?  What time interval did you set it for?
This was actually a sped up video.  This is the first time I've done a time lapse in this method.  It seemed to work pretty well.... Although it requires a lot of hard drive space!
Awesome video destin, it looks great fun i love the country you live in was that a lake any fish?.
